name: Fading Fate
description:
The lives of civilizations depend on your decisions.
Civilization will die, it's inevitable.
But death always comes with birth.

Civilization can die because of anything.

Overpopulation, extinction, overproduction, Underproduction, economical crisis, crisis of knowledge, technological singularity, Religious enlightenment, mass suicide, Cult shenanigans, world war, revolution, Degradation, meteorite, nuclear war.

Any civilization has its own odds. 

It's not your fault.
You're not a bad manager.
The species is just unadapted.

Game was made for a Ludum Dare 50 in 3 days. Theme is «Delay the Inevitable».

The Cough Team.
Art - Maxim Apolonskiy
Code - Vladislav Kovalev
Sound, art, code - Savva Krupnitskiy
